topic.title: Welcome to MALTALK
topic.body: Welcome to MALTALK, Malta's 1st uncensorable chat room.

1513626760_18zH6Av8AX7XdEW9PNFeb8QCs4QdM.body:
We'd appreciate if someone could test commenting and creating new threads. Thanks. If that doesn't for now, you can try commenting here instead:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1513544848_18zH6Av8AX7XdEW9PNFeb8QCs4QdMTVaYB

1513632971_1HGgW5HbNRcxUAVbAYXARrPL4MgPv.body: Hey! Welcome aboard. Please let me know if you can see my comment. Anyone else?
